channel.title: Today I Learned on Richard Sentino
channel.description: Recent content in Today I Learned on Richard Sentino

item.title: Ubuntu WSL
item.description: Today I learned that I can install Ubuntu or Suse Linux, straight from Windows App Store. I might have missed the opportunity which was announced 4 months ago Notes This is my first post of “Today I Learned” series of mini-blog: a mixed of tips, resources or anything. I spent at least 8 hours in front of the screen - coding and always learning.
